Interislander ferry Aratere runs aground near Picton: Minister, bosses front media https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/kiwrail-and-interislander-bosses-to-front-media-after-vessel-runs-aground-in-south-island/ZTI5DATV6VBYHD6664YZTKRDDM/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/kiwrail-and-interislander-bosses-to-front-media-after-vessel-runs-aground-in-south-island/ZTI5DATV6VBYHD6664YZTKRDDM/ Ben LeahyConcerns raised over recent maintenance work on steering systems.Sat, 22 Jun 2024 04:06:11 +0000 The Interislander ferry Aratere which ran into the South Island coastline.
